item.title: Michelle add a quote by Richard Leigh
item.description: "You’ve got to sing like you don’t need the money, Love like you’ll never get hurt. You’ve got to dance like nobody’s watchin’." -- Richard Leigh

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "This is not a novel to be tossed aside lightly. It should be thrown with great force." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "You can lead a horticulture, but you can't make her think." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "That would be a good thing for them to cut on my tombstone: Wherever she went, including here, it was against her better judgment." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Dorothy Parker
item.description: "Heterosexuality is not normal, it's just common." -- Dorothy Parker

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Jane Austen
item.description: "I do not want people to be very agreeable, as it saves me the trouble of liking them a great deal." -- Jane Austen

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Jim Butcher
item.description: "My hair had grown out long and shaggy—not in that sexy-young-rock-star kind of way but in that time-to-take-Rover-to-the-groomer kind of way." -- Jim Butcher

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "<i>Gone mad</i> is what they say, and sometimes <i>Run mad</i>, as if mad is a different direction, like west; as if mad is a different house you could step into, or a separate country entirely. But when you go mad you don't go any other place, you stay where you are. And somebody else comes in." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "There's an epigram tacked to my office bulletin board, pinched from a magazine -- "Wanting to meet an author because you like his work is like wanting to meet a duck because you like pâté." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Charlaine Harris
item.description: "Woo woo, secret vampire stuff!" -- Charlaine Harris

item.title: Michelle add a quote by Jon Stewart
item.description: "If you don't stick to your values when they're being tested, they're not values: they're hobbies." -- Jon Stewart
